min.name: Outside width min should be the same as inside width or 500
min.description: This is an OR statement to limit the max slider size

meta.description: If the banner.content-max-width is an empty string (no max-width), limit it to 500

max.name: Inside Width max should be the same as outside width or 3000

meta.description: If the banner max-width is an empty string (no max-width), limit it to 3000
